actions.desc: The ravenfolk scout makes one peck attack and one other melee or ranged attack.
actions.name: Multiattack

actions.desc: The ravenfolk scout furiously "beats"a set of phantasmal wings. Every creature within 5 feet of the ravenfolk must make a successful DC 12 Dexterity saving throw or be blinded until the start of the ravenfolk's next turn.
actions.name: Ghost Wings

actions.desc: Ranged Weapon Attack. +4 to hit, range 150/600 ft., one target. Hit: 6 (1d8 + 2) piercing damage.
actions.name: Longbow

actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 4 (1d4 + 2) piercing damage.
actions.name: Peck

actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 6 (1d8 + 2) piercing damage.
actions.name: Rapier

special_abilities.desc: Ravenfolk scouts can mimic the voices of others with uncanny accuracy. They have advantage on Charisma (Deception) checks involving audible mimicry.
special_abilities.name: Mimicry
